About us

Since 1984 ITS Europe has been supporting companies and professionals in the graphic industry with screen printing frames designed and entirely manufactured in Italy, combining artisanal precision with technological innovation. Our production stands out for the quality of the materials, the accuracy of the workmanship and the ability to offer custom solutions for every screen printing need.

With over forty years of experience, we have developed specialized know-how that allows us to respond quickly and with maximum reliability, always respecting agreed deadlines.

Our values

  • Speed: fast deliveries and optimized processes.
  • Punctuality: precision in timing and consistent reliability.
  • Reliability: transparency and responsibility for long-lasting relationships.

We believe that every project deserves attention to detail and top-quality materials. We continually invest in new technologies and production methods that combine tradition and innovation, ensuring high-performance and durable screen printing frames.

Whether it is wood frames, aluminum frames or iron frames, our mission is to provide printing tools that enhance our clients’ creative work, contributing to the success of every graphic project.
